- 2-Amino-3-methylimidazo[4,5-f]quinoline (IQ)
- 2-Amino-3,8-dimethylimidazo[4,5-f]quinoxaline (MeIQx)

Some of the most studied PAHs include:

- Benzo[a]pyrene (BaP)
- Dibenzo[a,h]anthracene (DBA)

- Avoid charring or burning meat
